statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vehicle_locations;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude < 0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations WHERE longitude > 0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 0 ORDER BY latitude DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY longitude ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude != 0 AND longitude != 0 ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE color = 'red';
SELECT model, manufacturer, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY model ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, timestamp, NOW()) AS time_elapsed FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 12345 ORDER BY time_elapsed DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -75;
SELECT vehicle_id, model, manufacturer, year FROM vehicles WHERE year >= 2010 ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp < '2021-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'Toy%' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, model, color FROM vehicles WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, gps_longitude FROM Vehicle WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Location WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM Location WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT timestamp FROM Tracking WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM Location WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT vehicle_name, gps_longitude, gps_latitude FROM Vehicle ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tracking WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM Location WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT id, vehicle_number, location FROM vehicles;
SELECT driver_id, name, phone_number FROM drivers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT assignment_id, vehicle_id, driver_id, route_id, assignment_time FROM vehicle_assignments ORDER BY assignment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, vehicle_number, location FROM vehicles WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT drivers.name, vehicles.vehicle_number, routes.route_id, vehicle_assignments.assignment_time FROM drivers JOIN vehicle_assignments ON drivers.driver_id = vehicle_assignments.driver_id JOIN vehicles ON vehicle_assignments.vehicle_id = vehicles.id JOIN routes ON vehicle_assignments.route_id = routes.route_id WHERE location && 'POINT(1.23 4.56)';
SELECT AVG(distance) AS average_distance FROM routes GROUP BY route_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY average_distance DESC;

SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY assignment_time) AS assignment_rank, drivers.name AS driver_name, vehicles.vehicle_number, routes.route_id FROM drivers JOIN vehicle_assignments ON drivers.driver_id = vehicle_assignments.driver_id JOIN vehicles ON vehicle_assignments.vehicle_id = vehicles.id JOIN routes ON vehicle_assignments.route_id = routes.route_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, latitude, longitude FROM vehicles;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT driver_name, phone_number FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, start_latitude, start_longitude, end_latitude, end_longitude FROM routes WHERE end_latitude < start_latitude;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT route_name, start_latitude, start_longitude FROM routes WHERE end_latitude = 40.7128 AND end_longitude = -74.0060;
SELECT vehicle_name, latitude, longitude FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 123 ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM locations WHERE vehicle_id = 456 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT description, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE location_id = 789 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
